name: Black Widow
review: An all around enjoying movie. Florence Pugh stole the show with her humor. Scarlett Johansson put on a great final performance as she closes out a decade of Black Widow on a high note.

name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
review: Genuinely one of the best movies to come out in awhile. There is just something funny and familiar with Abbi Jacobson's voice. Haven't laughed this hard at a movie in recent memory.

name: Fear Street
review: An ambitious idea by Netflix to release an entire film trilogy over the course of 3 weeks. A very Netflix thing to do. It feels a lot like Stranger Things, except the main character and her motivations, saving her boring girlfriend, are both unappealing. Way better people die so these two lame-os get to survive? Boo! Still like it though
